full_summary:
================================
## Professional Services for Hazardous Materials and Indoor Air Quality Assessments

### Request for Standing Offer

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) hereby issues a Request for Standing Offer (RFSA) for professional services related to hazardous materials and indoor air quality assessments (HAQs).

#### Solicitation Number and Amendment Information

* Solicitation Number: WS4554083321
* Amendment Number: 6
* Amendment Date: July 10, 2024

#### Tender Information

* Tender Closing Date: July 15, 2024, at 2:00 PM EDT (14:00 hours)
* Expected Contract Start Date: None
* Expected Contract End Date: August 31, 2029

#### Key Services

The subject RFSA seeks professionals to provide the following services:

* Environmental services, including environmental planning and reporting
* Hazardous materials assessments and indoor air quality evaluations

#### Eligibility and Evaluation

* Bidders must demonstrate a strong understanding of the UN/EDIFACT standards (77000000, 77101600 and 77102000 for environmental services, planning and reporting).
* The evaluation process will be based on a combination of technical merit and price.
* The selection criteria include:
	+ Technical understanding of the services provided
	+ Quality of the submitted proposal
	+ Extensive experience in similar projects

#### Trade Agreements

This RFSA is open to bidders from Canada and countries participating in various trade agreements, including:

	* North American Free Trade Agreement (NAFTA)
	* Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
	* Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
	* … (list of remaining trade agreements applicable)

#### Regions of Opportunity

No specific regions of opportunity are mentioned.

#### Regions of Delivery

* Contracts will be executed nationwide within Canada.

#### Contact Information

For further information, please contact:

Pizzi, Len (SPAC/PSPC)
len.pizzi@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

#### Notice and Attachments

The full notice and attachments are available at:
